thread.title: Bull on the loose after escaping slaughterhouse in New York City | Metro News
thread.title_full: Bull on the loose after escaping slaughterhouse in New York City | Metro News

author: Tomeyjes For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Bull on the loose after escaping slaughterhouse in New York City | Metro News
text:
Toby Meyjes for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 21 Feb 2017 5:55 pm The bull was on the loose in New York City after escaping a slaughterhouse (Twitter/Vladimir Vilsaint) 
Police are chasing a bull through New York after it escaped a slaughterhouse this morning. 
Officers had cornered the animal in the garden of a property in Queens, however, it escape despite attempts to sedate it with darts. Nail-biting rescue of snowboarder who was completely buried for 10 minutes 
Video shows the animal running through Jamaica in Queens, with at least ten police vehicles in pursuit. 
According to ABC 7 , it escaped from a slaughterhouse and police were trying to get workers to come to the scene to capture it. 
‚ÄòI saw this big, black thing running with all this drool from its mouth like it was ready to eat something alive. 

‚Äî AOL KEYWORD: Mike (@mikeFAIL) February 21, 2017 Got vid of bull escaping from cops in Queens from a nearby slaughterhouse. "move! Everybody run!" a cop yelled @NYDailyNews @NYDNVideo pic.twitter.com/earTQiOGHJ 
‚Äî Edgar Sandoval (@edjsandoval) February 21, 2017 WATCH: They are really live streaming this wild bull as he roams freely through Jamaica, Queens üòÇ https://t.co/kMQE34pF0i pic.twitter.com/lYOAF5YL89 
‚Äî Power 105.1 (@Power1051) February 21, 2017 Cow on the loose‚Äì Bull escapes from a slaughter house here is a clip from live feed from Queens, NY #komonews #gocowgo pic.twitter.com/8Sz5ZhDL14 
‚Äî Ryan Yamamoto (@YamsTV) February 21, 2017 
‚ÄòI busted a U-turn and and I‚Äôm like, I‚Äôm going where this is going, because I‚Äôve never see anything like this in my life,‚Äù said Kenneisha Cassan, 27, told the New York Post . 
‚ÄòAt least four or five cops tried to back him in in the playground, and he wasn‚Äôt having it,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúHe was like, no, I‚Äôm not trying to get killed today.‚Äô More
